problem.markdown:
>>What can cause an operation to stop? <<
[x] The machine is starved; there are no parts for the machine to work on. [x] The machine is blocked; e.g. the storage buffer that follows this operation is full. [x] The operator is not there. [x] The machine is under repair. [Explanation] An operation cannot take place until all the required items are present at the same place at the same time. [Explanation]
